property.name: Card Text
property.value: Response: After a POLAR event card is played, exhaust Captain George Thorfinnsen to choose and wound an exhausted character.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Exhaust The Barque Miskatonic to choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character does not exhaust to commit to stories.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Forced Response: After a player plays a card, until the end of the phase that player can only play cards that belong to a different faction than that card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Attach to a character you control. Attached character gets +1 skill. Action: Exhaust Notebook Sketches and name a card. The cost for all players to play that card is increased by 4 until the beginning of your next turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Attach to a character. Attache character loses FAST. Attached character is immune to POLAR events and gains TOUGHNESS +1.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Attach to a character you control. Attached character gains the SCIENTIST subtype. Response: After an opponent's character is destroyed, attach that card to Specimen Bags. The owner of that card cannot play additional copies of that card while it is attached to Specimen Bags.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Attach to a character. Response: After an opponent plays a card, sacrifice Hand Camera to search your deck for a card with the same title and put it into your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Stories you win are not replaced from the story deck while there is at least one non-cospiracy story card in play.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Immune to POLAR events. Response: After a player plays a POLAR event, exhaust Giant Albino Penguin to draw a card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Play during your opponent's turn. Action: Choose a character that is currently committed to a story. Until the end of the phase, that character does not count its icons or skill.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Play during your opponent's turn, after their characters have been committed to stories. Action: Choose an opponent's character that is not committed to a story. Take control of that character until the end of the phase, and commit it to a story of your choice, if able.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cards cannot be attached to Forgotten Shoggoth. Any time a card would go to your discard pile, put that card on the bottom of your deck.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Forced Response: After an event card is played, exhaust Reawakened Elder Thing if able.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Immune to POLAR events. Response: After Antarctic Yeti commits to a story on your turn, choose a character without any wounds on it. Until the end of the phase, treat that character as if its printed text box were blank.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Attach to a player's discard pile. Cards cannot be moved out of attached discard pile for any reason.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Immune to POLAR events. You may play with up to 8 copies of Alaskan Sledge Dog in your deck. Alaskan Sledge Dog gains # icon and +1 skill for each card titled Alaskan Sledge Dog in play.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Play during your opponent's turn, after all characters have been committed to stories. Action: Choose and wound up to X characters. X is the number of POLAR events in your discard pile.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Play during your opponent's turn, after characters have been committed to stories. Action: Exhaust a character that is not committed to a stor. Then, give that character 1 wound for each POLAR event in your discard pile.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Play during your opponent's turn. Action: Choose a character committed to a story. Remove that character from that story. Then, that character's controller must commit it to a different story, if able.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: After a POLAR event is played, attach that card to Realm of Ice and Death. A POLAR event card a player owns can be played from Realm of Ice and Death as if it was in that player's hand by removing 1 success token from Realm of Ice and Death as a part of the cost of that event.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Safari Hunter gains # for each MONSTER character committed to the same story as it.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Reponse: After a MONSTER character enters play, take a WEAPON card from your discad pile and attach it to a character you control.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: MONSTER or ANCIENT ONE characters committed to the same story as Mr. Ngamber lose all toughness.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Exhaust Cafeteria Lady to choose and exhaust a character with at least 1 @ icon.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Forced Reponse: After all players have committed characters to stories, you immediately win any story where u have 11 characters committed if your opponent does not have 11 characters committed to that same story.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: MONSTER characters do not count their skill when committed to stories.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Forced Reponse: When a MONSTER or CREATURE character comes into play, it loses all @ icons until the end of the phase, and it immediately goes insane.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Forced Response: After Demented Caretaker comes into play, choose and exhaust a character with skill 4 or higher or sacrifice Demented Caretaker.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Count Island Hermit's skill towards any story where an ANCIENT ONE character is committed.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Bokrug's text box cannot be blanked, or treated as if it were blank. Forced Response: After Bokrug is wounded as the result of a # struggle, choose and wound another character committed to the same story, if able.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Ghatanothoa's text box cannot be blanked, or treated as if it were blank. Ghatanothoa gains a # icon for each card in your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Response: After you play Aspiring Artist, draw 2 cards. Use the ability only if there are no story cards in your won story pile.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Atlach-Nacha's text box cannot be blanked, or treated as if it were blank. Response: After Atlach-Nacha commits to a story, discard the top card of any opponent's deck. If that card is not a character card, place 1 success token on that story.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Exhaust all copies of Bringer of Fire to choose and destroy a character with skill 4 or lower. Use this ability only if you control more than 1 card named Bringer of Fire.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cthugha's text box cannot be blanked, or treated as if it were blank. While Cthugha is committed to a story, all other characters committed to that story do not count their # icons.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If Tcho-Tcho Tribe is the only defending character committed to a story, it gains +5 skill and @ # # $.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your MONSTER cards are also SPELL cards while they are in your hand, deck, or discard pile.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Nyogtha's text box cannot be blanked, or treated as if it were blank. Action: Sacrifice a MONSTER character to ready Nyogtha, or to remove a wound token from Nyogtha.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Lower the cost to play MONSTER and ANCIENT ONE cards from your hand by 1. (To a minimum of 1.)

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Response: When Dark Druid enters play from your hand, search your deck for a card titled Dark Druid, reveal it, and place it in your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Each character controlled by an opponent loses #.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Play during your operations phase. Action: Choose and destroy a non-_ resource or a LOCATION support card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Pay 1 to choose a character. Change one of that character's % icons into an icon of your choice until the end of the phase.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Play during your operations phase. Action: Search your deck for a card and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Exhaust Danny O'Bannion's Crony to choose and ready a CRIMINAL character other than Danny O'Bannion's Crony. Until the end of the phase, that character gains # %.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Exhaust Gun Runner's Club to draw a card. Use this ability only if an opponent has more cards in hand than you.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Forced Response: After a story to which Cthuloid Spawn is committed resolves, destroy all committed characters.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Play during your operations phase. Action: Each player sacrifices all characters without any cards attached. Skip your story phase this turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Response: After Obscene Byakhee enters play, each opponent discards a card from his hand at random.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Exhaust Altar of Madness to lower the cost of the next event card you play this phase by X (to a minimum of 1), where X is the number of insane characters controlled by all opponents.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Response: After Elder Thing enters play, put up to 2 cards from your discard pile on top of your deck in any order.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Play during your operations phase. Action: Reveal the top 5 cards of an opponent's deck. Put into play a character revealed this way under your control. Then, shuffle that opponent's deck.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: While Dreamlands Messenger is committed to a story, each player cannot play events or trigger card abilities.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Play during your operations phase. Action: Until the end of your next turn, each player skips his story phase. Draw a card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Response: After an opponent plays a card paying lower than its printed cost choose a story. Place a success token on that story.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Pay 2 to choose a character. Attach Ghost of Perdition to that character (counts as a CURSE with the text "Attached character gains @ @ @."). At the end of the phase, sacrifice Ghost of Perdition.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Drive Arkham Inmate insane. Response: After Arkham Inmate is restored, choose a story. Until the end of the phase, opponents cannot commit more than 1 character to that story.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Attach to a support card. Attached card gains the ARTIFACT subtype. Response: After attached support enters a discard pile, draw 3 cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Response: After you play an ANCIENT ONE character, search your deck for an ANCIENT ONE character, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Response: After a character goes insane, its controller discards 2 cards at random from his hand. Then, for each event or support card thus discarder, you may place 1 success token on a story.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Response: After a card with the INDEPENDENT subtype is destroyed, exhaust 607 Walter Street to return that character to play under its owner's control.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Exhaust Artist's Colony to have each player reveal and discard the top card of his deck. If you revealed the card with the highest printed cost, instead put that card into your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Shuffle Basil Elton into its owner's deck to choose and refresh a domain.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Until the end of the phase, each character gets -X skill, where X is its printed skill.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Disrupt: If Charles Dexter Ward would go insane, choose another character instead. That character goes insane, if able.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Pay 1 to choose and exhaust a character with skill 2 or lower.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Response: After Granny Orne enters play, destroy all insane characters.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Choose a story. Until the end of the turn, no struggles at this story resolve.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Neil's Curiosity Shop gains the triggered abilities of each support card controlled by an opponent.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Response: After Nodens enters play, wound all characters with skill 3 or lower.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Exhaust and sacrifice a DEEP ONE character to choose and destroy a character without any $ icons.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Sacrifice the Hall School to choose an icon. Until the end of the phase, each character you control gains one of the chosen icons.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: After you play The Rope and Anchor Tavern from your hand, name a SUBTYPE. Action: Exhaust The Rope and Anchor Tavern to lower the cost of the next character you play this phase with the named SUBTYPE by 1 (to a minimum of 1).

card.name: * The Seventh House on the Left

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Exhaust The Seventh House on the Left to choose and exhaust a character or support card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: While The Terrible Old Man is committed to a story, choose a struggle icon. Struggles of that type do not resolve in that story this phase unless an opponent pays 2.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Response: After another character you control is destroyed, pay 2 to put into play that character from your discard pile.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Play during your operations phase. Action: Choose and destroy a support card. Then, draw a card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: CULTIST characters get +1 skill and gain @. Action: Sacrifice a CULTIST character to choose and destroy a non-ANCIENT ONE character with skill 2 or lower.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Response: After an event card is played, pay 3 to copy the effects of that event.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Response: After a character or support card controlled by an opponent is exhausted, pay 1 to look at the top 2 cards of your deck. Put one or both on the bottom of your deck, and the rest back on top of your deck.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If you win this story and control at least 1 { character, you may draw 5 cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Play on your opponent's turn after all players have committed their characters. Action: Each player who has committed at least one character to 3 or more stories this phase sacrifices all committed characters.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Pay 1 to choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character gains or loses an icon of your choice.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Play during your operations phase. Action: Each player may search his deck for an ANCIENT ONE character with printed cost 6 or lower and put it into play. Then, shuffle all decks searched in this way.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: While there is at least 1 Conspiracy card in play, Crazy Eddie gets +1 Skill and gains # $.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Forced Response: At the beginning of each player's turn, that player must sacrifice a support card if able.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If you win this story and control at least 1 > character, put into play up to 3 > characters from your discard pile.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Attach to a character you control. Response: After attached character commits to a story on your turn, pay 1 to choose up to two characters. Those characters must commit to that story if able.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Exhaust Kitab Al-Azif and discard a card from your hand to have each player choose a story. Until the end of the phase, all players need 1 fewer success token in order to win those stories.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Response: After a character is wounded, pay 1 and exhaust Mr. Grey to put 1 success token on any story.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: While there is at least 1 Conspiracy card in play, Mutant Spawn gains @ @.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: While there is at least 1 Conspiracy card in play, Ol' Lazy Eyes gains @. Response: After you play Ol' Lazy Eyes, search your deck for a Conspiracy card, reveal it to all players, and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Players must pay 2 at the beginning of the story phase in order to commit characters with skill 2 or lower that phase.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Response: After you play Shrieking Byakhee from your hand, pay 2 to search your deck for a character with the word "Byakhee" in its title and put it into play. Then shuffle your deck.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If you win this story and control at least 1 _ character, you may choose and wound any number of characters without any # icons.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If you win this story and control at least 1 ] character, you may choose any number of characters to go insane.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If you win this story and control at least 1 [ character, you may choose and destroy up to 2 characters or support cards in play.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If you win this story and control at least one < character, you may discard the top 13 cards of each opponent's deck.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If you win this story and control at least 1 } character, you may force each opponent to discard his or her hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: While there is at least 1 Conspiracy card in play, you draw an additional card during your draw phase.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Shuffle Ancient Gold into your deck to reduce the cost of the next } character you play this phase by 1 (to a minimum of 1).

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Response: After a character or support card you control is destroyed, sacrifice Canine Guardian to return that card to your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Forced Response: After a player places a success token on a story, discard the top card of that player's deck.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Exhaust Development Camp to choose a character. That character gets +1 skill and a # icon until the end of the phase.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Response: After Feathery Watchers are committed to a story during your turn, choose an opponent's non-ANCIENT ONE character. That character cannot commit to that story.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Exhaust and sacrifice Hack Journalist to choose a story and move all success token from one side of this story to another.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Sacrifice Lavinia Whateley to search your deck for a < or [ character, reveal that character, and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: 10 success tokens are required to win this story. Characters printed cost 2 or lower cannot commit to any story other than this one.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Play after all players have committed characters to stories. Action: Choose a committed character you control. Uncommit that character and re-commit that character to a different story.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Attach to a character you control. Action: Exhaust Pocket Telescope to look at the top card of your deck. You may put this card at the bottom of your deck.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Response: After one of your characters or a TOME support card you control is destroyed, name a card. Reveal the top five cards of an opponent's deck for a copy of that card and discard it. Then, shuffle that deck.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Response: After you draw Professor Morgan from your deck in any phase other than the draw phase, put him into play.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Any time a triggered effect would cause a player to draw a card, that player draws an additional card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Response: After a card changes control, exhaust Sentinel Hill to return that card to it's owner's hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Treat all characters committed to this story as if their text boxes were blank.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Choose an opponent. That opponent gains control of The Dunwich Horror, if able. If control changes, choose and destroy another character or support card that player controls. This ability cannot be canceled or disrupted.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Exhaust The Stone on the Peak and pay X to shuffle the top X cards of any discard pile back into their owner's deck.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Attach to a character you control. Action: Pay 4 and sacrifice Whateley's Diary to redistribute in any manner all of your success tokens onto stories among your side of the story cards in play.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Forced Response: After you succeed at a story to which Wilbur Whateley was committed, place a success token on Wilbur Whateley. Any time Wilbur Whateley has 4 or more success tokens on him, move him to his owner's won story pile as a won story for that player.
